events.message: Customer reported an accident involving their car colliding with a stationary object on April 30th.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident due to keywords like car and collision in the initial report.
An agent with expertise in vehicle accidents was assigned to handle this claim promptly.
Customer was sent an acknowledgment confirming receipt of the auto accident claim for further processing.
Requested the customer to submit photos of the vehicle damage and police report regarding the collision.
Customer submitted all requested documents including photos, repair estimates, and the police accident report.
Investigation into the circumstances of the car accident and validity of damages has officially commenced.
Investigation concluded, confirming the customer's vehicle sustained damage consistent with reported collision.
A settlement amount covering full repairs and associated costs was proposed to the customer.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and appreciated timely responses.
Claim was approved after customer acceptance of the proposed settlement terms was received.
Payment for vehicle repair costs was issued directly to the repair shop as per agreement.
With payment issued and customer confirmed repair delivery, this auto accident claim was officially closed.
The finalized claim documents and correspondence were archived for future reference and compliance.
